label: 大師講
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [Also known as minazukie, Dengyō chōkō] The Lotus lectures and disputations at the Sixth Month Service marked the death date of Dengyō Daishi (Saichō; 767-822), the founder of the Japanese Tendai sect (p. 511n). [水無月会、伝教長講、伝教大師、最澄、天台] [HW]
